Summary
-------
Update year selectors and pages to include years 2010–2025 and switch to reading available years from the generated manifest when possible.

Acceptance criteria
- [ ] Year lists include 2010–2025.
- [ ] UI reads available years from manifest if present; otherwise falls back to built-in years.
- [ ] Unit/smoke test asserts 2010 exists in the year selector.
